mapper.select: SELECT o.enterprise_code,e.enterprise_name FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_enterprise e ON e.enterprise_code = o.enterprise_code /*WHERE TO_DAYS( now() ) - TO_DAYS(o.create_time) = 0*/ GROUP BY o.enterprise_code
mapper.update:
update t_enterprise set enterprise_status=2 where enterprise_status=1
and till_time <= now()
